certifications.description: Demonstrating proficiency in the fundamentals of generative artificial intelligence and its applications.
certifications.title: Certification in Career Essentials in Generative AI

certifications.description: Validating expertise in SQL and database management, including querying, data manipulation, and database design.
certifications.title: SQL Certification

education.field_of_study: Computer Science Engineering, Minor in Computer Science

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Conceptualized and built a personal website showcasing frontend development skills, leveraging Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) for visual aesthetics and responsiveness. Incorporated Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) and JavaScript to construct the website's structure and enhance interactivity. Balanced the use of CSS, HTML, and JavaScript to create an optimized and efficient website, resulting in a visually appealing and user-friendly portfolio.

projects.name: Face Recognition System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a face recognition system using OpenCV and Python libraries such as cv2, os, numpy, and PIL, achieving an accuracy of over 80%. Utilized Jupyter notebook for prototyping and development, resulting in efficient and organized code. Demonstrated proficiency in computer vision and machine learning techniques to create a robust face recognition system.

experiences.description: Designed and developed a portfolio website as a frontend developer, utilizing CSS for 54.2% of the project to create visually appealing and responsive layouts. Implemented HTML for 42.7% of the website's structure, ensuring proper semantics and accessibility. Utilized JavaScript for 3.1% of the project to add interactivity and enhance user experience. Demonstrated proficiency in balancing the use of CSS, HTML, and JavaScript to create an optimized and efficient website.

Conducted extensive research on cooperative localization in 5G-enabled vehicle networks, exploring potential applications in medical and military domains. Designed and implemented a deep neural network-based prototype, achieving over 80% accuracy in improving position estimation in dynamic scenarios. Collaborated with a multidisciplinary team, sharing insights and advancing the integration of 5G and vehicular networks.

full_output.name: Chanakya Chikati
achievements_and_awards: Successfully completed the Certification in Career Essentials in Generative AI by Microsoft and LinkedIn, achieving a score of 80% on June 26th, 2024, demonstrating proficiency in the fundamentals of generative artificial intelligence and its applications.
Earned SQL Certification by IBM, completed on June 25th, 2024, validating expertise in SQL and database management, including querying, data manipulation, and database design.

Recognized by IIT Guwahati for excellent initiatives and outstanding contributions during the Coincent Partnership program in June 2024, demonstrating exceptional commitment and dedication towards the project.
